hints.content: Start by identifying what a special substring is. A special substring consists of repeated instances of the same character. For example, in the string 'aaa', 'a', 'aa', and 'aaa' are all special substrings.

Consider how to extract substrings from the given string. You can use a nested loop to generate all possible substrings, but remember that you only need to focus on substrings made of the same character.

Think about how to count occurrences of a substring. You can use a sliding window approach to check how many times a substring appears in the string. This will help in determining if it occurs at least thrice.
When checking for occurrences, ensure that you are counting non-overlapping instances of the substring. This means you need to be careful with your indexing when searching for the next occurrence.
You might want to keep track of the maximum length of special substrings that occur at least thrice. Consider using a dictionary to store the lengths of special substrings and their counts.
Remember to handle edge cases, such as when the string has no repeating characters. In such cases, you should return -1 as specified in the problem statement.

Think about how to efficiently check for substrings of different lengths. You can iterate over possible lengths from 1 up to half the length of the string, since a substring must occur at least thrice.
As you iterate through possible lengths, ensure you are only checking substrings that are special. This means you should skip substrings that contain more than one unique character.
When you find a special substring that occurs thrice, update your maximum length if it's greater than the previously recorded maximum. Keep track of this value throughout your iterations.
Finally, ensure that you return the maximum length found, or -1 if no valid substring was found. The return format should be an integer, as specified in the problem statement.

questionNotes: The string consists only of lowercase English letters.
A substring is contiguous and non-empty.
You need to find substrings that occur at least thrice.
Return -1 if no special substring occurs at least thrice.
